languages.text: {n}Едва уловимое движение руки — и перед вашими глазами сверкает ослепительная металлическая розетта, символ беспредельной власти Инквизиции.{/n} "Держите себя в руках, фон Валанциус. Вы в шаге от слов, что могут быть расценены как неповиновение {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Трону{/g} — возможно, худшая ересь, что может совершить слуга Императора". {n}Спустя мгновение розетта исчезает в складках плаща.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Едва уловимое движение руки — и перед вашими глазами сверкает ослепительная металлическая розетта, символ беспредельной власти Инквизиции.{/n} "Держите себя в руках, фон Валанциус. Вы в шаге от слов, что могут быть расценены как неповиновение Трону — возможно, худшая ересь, что может совершить слуга Императора". {n}Спустя мгновение розетта исчезает в складках плаща.{/n}

languages.text: {n}One barely noticeable motion — and a resplendent metal rosette flashes before your eyes, the symbol of the Inquisition's limitless power.{/n} "Control yourself, von Valancius. You are a step away from uttering words that could be interpreted as defiance of the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Throne{/g} — quite possibly the worst heresy that can be committed by a servant of the Emperor." {n}A moment passes, and the rosette vanishes in the folds of his cloak.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Едва уловимое движение руки — и перед вашими глазами сверкает ослепительная металлическая розетта, символ беспредельной власти Инквизиции.{/n} "Держите себя в руках, фон Валанциус. Вы в шаге от слов, что могут быть расценены как неповиновение {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Трону{/g} — возможно, худшая ересь, что может совершить слуга Императора". {n}Спустя мгновение розетта исчезает в складках плаща.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}One barely noticeable motion — and a resplendent metal rosette flashes before your eyes, the symbol of the Inquisition's limitless power.{/n} "Control yourself, von Valancius. You are a step away from uttering words that can be interpreted as disobedience to the Throne — quite possibly the worst heresy that can be committed by the Emperor's servant." {n}A moment passes, and the rosette vanishes in the folds of his cloak.{/n}

You are a step away from uttering words that could be interpreted as defiance of the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Throne{/g} — quite possibly the worst heresy that can be committed by a servant of the Emperor." {n}A moment passes, and the rosette vanishes in the folds of his cloak.{/n}

languages.text: {n}微かに動いた後、異端審問庁の無限の力の象徴である、燦然と輝く金属製のロゼッタが目の前で光った。{/n}「控えよ、フォン・ヴァランシウス。そのままでは{g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}王座{/g}への反抗と解釈されかねない言葉を発するだろう。そうなった場合、皇帝に仕える者が犯しうる最悪の異端行為とみなされる」{n}しばらくして、ロゼッタは彼のクロークの中へと消えていった。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}One barely noticeable motion — and a resplendent metal rosette flashes before your eyes, the symbol of the Inquisition's limitless power.{/n} "Control yourself, von Valancius. You are a step away from uttering words that could be interpreted as defiance of the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Throne{/g} — quite possibly the worst heresy that can be committed by a servant of the Emperor." {n}A moment passes, and the rosette vanishes in the folds of his cloak.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}微かに動いた後、異端審問庁の無限の力の象徴である、燦然と輝く金属製のロゼッタが目の前で光った。{/n}「控えよ、フォン・ヴァランシウス。そのままでは{g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}王座{/g}への反抗と解釈されかねない言葉を発するだろう。そうなった場合、皇帝に仕える者が犯しうる最悪の異端行為とみなされる」{n}しばらくして、ロゼッタは彼のクロークの中へと消えていった。{/n}

languages.text: {n}海因里希做了个几乎察觉不到的动作。随后，一个金光闪闪的金属玫瑰结在你眼前闪耀，那是审判庭无限权力的象征。{/n}“冷静点，冯·瓦兰修斯。你刚刚说出的话，恐怕只差一点点，就可以被解读为对{g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}黄金王座{/g}的蔑视。这或许是帝皇的仆人能犯下的最严重的异端邪说。”{n}片刻之后，玫瑰结消失在他斗篷的褶皱里。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}One barely noticeable motion — and a resplendent metal rosette flashes before your eyes, the symbol of the Inquisition's limitless power.{/n} "Control yourself, von Valancius. You are a step away from uttering words that could be interpreted as defiance of the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Throne{/g} — quite possibly the worst heresy that can be committed by a servant of the Emperor." {n}A moment passes, and the rosette vanishes in the folds of his cloak.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希做了个几乎察觉不到的动作。随后，一个金光闪闪的金属玫瑰结在你眼前闪耀，那是审判庭无限权力的象征。{/n}“冷静点，冯·瓦兰修斯。你刚刚说出的话，恐怕只差一点点，就可以被解读为对{g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}黄金王座{/g}的蔑视。这或许是帝皇的仆人能犯下的最严重的异端邪说。”{n}片刻之后，玫瑰结消失在他斗篷的褶皱里。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Con un movimiento imperceptible, ante tus ojos refulge una brillante roseta de metal, símbolo del poder ilimitado de la Inquisición.{/n} «Contrólese, von Valancius. Está a punto de pronunciar palabras que podrían interpretarse como una ofensa al {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Trono{/g}. No existe herejía peor que pueda cometer un siervo del Emperador». {n}Tras un instante, la roseta desaparece entre los pliegues de su capa.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}One barely noticeable motion — and a resplendent metal rosette flashes before your eyes, the symbol of the Inquisition's limitless power.{/n} "Control yourself, von Valancius. You are a step away from uttering words that could be interpreted as defiance of the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Throne{/g} — quite possibly the worst heresy that can be committed by a servant of the Emperor." {n}A moment passes, and the rosette vanishes in the folds of his cloak.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Con un movimiento imperceptible, ante tus ojos refulge una brillante roseta de metal, símbolo del poder ilimitado de la Inquisición.{/n} «Contrólese, von Valancius. Está a punto de pronunciar palabras que podrían interpretarse como una ofensa al {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Trono{/g}. No existe herejía peor que pueda cometer un siervo del Emperador». {n}Tras un instante, la roseta desaparece entre los pliegues de su capa.{/n}

languages.text: {n}D'un geste à peine perceptible, un splendide insigne métallique apparaît devant vos yeux, symbole du pouvoir sans limites de l'Inquisition.{/n} « Reprenez-vous, von Valancius. Vous êtes à deux doigts de prononcer des mots qui pourraient être considérés comme une insulte au {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Trône{/g}, l'une des pires hérésies pouvant être commises par {mf|un serviteur|une servante} de l'Empereur. » {n}Après un bref instant, l'insigne disparaît à nouveau dans les revers de sa cape.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}One barely noticeable motion — and a resplendent metal rosette flashes before your eyes, the symbol of the Inquisition's limitless power.{/n} "Control yourself, von Valancius. You are a step away from uttering words that could be interpreted as defiance of the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Throne{/g} — quite possibly the worst heresy that can be committed by a servant of the Emperor." {n}A moment passes, and the rosette vanishes in the folds of his cloak.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}D'un geste à peine perceptible, un splendide insigne métallique apparaît devant vos yeux, symbole du pouvoir sans limites de l'Inquisition.{/n} « Reprenez-vous, von Valancius. Vous êtes à deux doigts de prononcer des mots qui pourraient être considérés comme une insulte au {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Trône{/g}, l'une des pires hérésies pouvant être commises par {mf|un serviteur|une servante} de l'Empereur. » {n}Après un bref instant, l'insigne disparaît à nouveau dans les revers de sa cape.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Eine kaum wahrnehmbare Geste – und vor deiner Nase blitzt eine prächtige Metallrosette auf, das Symbol der grenzenlosen Macht der Inquisition.{/n} "Beherrscht Euch, von Valancius. Ihr seid einen Schritt von einer Äußerung entfernt, die als Auflehnung gegen den {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Thron{/g} gedeutet werden könnten – möglicherweise die schlimmste Ketzerei, die {mf|ein Diener|eine Dienerin} des Imperators begehen kann." {n}Im nächsten Augenblick verschwindet die Rosette in den Falten seines Umhangs.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}One barely noticeable motion — and a resplendent metal rosette flashes before your eyes, the symbol of the Inquisition's limitless power.{/n} "Control yourself, von Valancius. You are a step away from uttering words that could be interpreted as defiance of the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Throne{/g} — quite possibly the worst heresy that can be committed by a servant of the Emperor." {n}A moment passes, and the rosette vanishes in the folds of his cloak.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Eine kaum wahrnehmbare Geste – und vor deiner Nase blitzt eine prächtige Metallrosette auf, das Symbol der grenzenlosen Macht der Inquisition.{/n} "Beherrscht Euch, von Valancius. Ihr seid einen Schritt von einer Äußerung entfernt, die als Auflehnung gegen den {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Thron{/g} gedeutet werden könnten – möglicherweise die schlimmste Ketzerei, die {mf|ein Diener|eine Dienerin} des Imperators begehen kann." {n}Im nächsten Augenblick verschwindet die Rosette in den Falten seines Umhangs.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Fark edilmesi güç, ani bir hareketle gözlerinin önünde parlak metal bir rozet beliriyor: Engizisyon'un engin gücünün simgesi.{/n} "Kendine hâkim ol von Valancius. {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Taht'a{/g} muhalefet olarak yorumlanabilecek sözler sarf etmeye bir adım uzaktasın. Bu, bir İmparator hizmetkârının işleyebileceği en beter kâfirliktir." {n}Rozet, göz açıp kapayana dek pelerininin katları arasında kayboluveriyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}One barely noticeable motion — and a resplendent metal rosette flashes before your eyes, the symbol of the Inquisition's limitless power.{/n} "Control yourself, von Valancius. You are a step away from uttering words that could be interpreted as defiance of the {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Throne{/g} — quite possibly the worst heresy that can be committed by a servant of the Emperor." {n}A moment passes, and the rosette vanishes in the folds of his cloak.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Zor zar fark edilen bir hareketle Engizisyon'un engin gücünün sembolü olan parlak metal bir rozetin ışıltısı gözlerini kamaştırıyor.{/n} "Kendine hâkim ol von Valancius. {g|Encyclopedia:GoldenThrone}Taht{/g}'a muhalefet olarak nitelendirilebilecek sözler söylemeye çok yakınsın. Bu, bir İmparator hizmetkârının işleyebileceği en beter kâfirliktir." {n}Rozet, göz açıp kapayana dek pelerininin pileleri arasında kayboluveriyor.{/n}
